success.title: Success
success.text: Your changes have been successfully saved!

textBlock1.title: Made with love üíú
textBlock1.text: At dnd-tracker, we are not of many words. We let the product speak for itself. What was an encounter tracker as a main idea quickly turned into a much bigger thing. With more and more ideas coming forward, we are currently expanding the dnd-tracker. This will make playing even more exciting, mysterious, easier AND more enjoyable.

summary.title: Why choose dnd-tracker for your encounters ü§î
summary.item2: We are constantly working to optimize the product
summary.item3: Everything in 1 convenient place for the DM
summary.item5: Plenty of information you can get your hands on
summary.item6: Attractive dark mode design for all vampires among us

textBlock2.title: Weird stuff üêõ
textBlock2.text: Because we are still in the start-up phase of this dnd tracker, sometimes mysterious errors may appear. Please don't hesitate and be sure to let us know so we can fix them quickly.

error.404: Oh no.. We lost this page
error.text: We searched everywhere but couldn't find what you're looking for. Let's find a better place for you to go.

died.title: Player died
died.textMinHP: The player has too many negative hp and is dead
died.textDeathSaves: The player failed his death saves three times and is dead

stable.title: Player stabilized
stable.textDeathSaves: The player saved his death saves three times and is stabilized

success.text: The email is sent to your mailbox.

pricing.title: Designed for the best dungeon masters, like you.
pricing.text: Affordable Prices, Quality Service. At DnD-Tracker, we believe in delivering high-quality service at a fair price. Our pricing plans are designed to fit your needs and budget. Choose the best option for you and enjoy a seamless experience with us. Get in touch with us today to learn more.
pricing.starter: Best option for getting to know the product. Best for dungeon masters with 1-3 running campaigns.
pricing.medior: Best option for the dungeon master with multiple active campaigns running at the same time.
pricing.pro: Best option for the professional dungeon masters and when you work with multiple DM's on the same campaigns.

contact.title: Love to hear from you, Get in touch üëã

cookieBanner.text: When u use this website you accept that we only use functionel cookies.

linkModal.demo: This isn't available in the demo

homeDiceRolling.title: Roll with ease
homeDiceRolling.text: A digital dice roller is a convenient tool that allows users to roll multiple dice of the same type with ease. With its fast and easy rolling capabilities, it's an essential tool for any tabletop gamer. For dungeon masters, it can significantly speed up their workflow, allowing them to focus more on storytelling and gameplay.

homebrewTable.title: Ready to unleash your creativity?
homebrewTable.text: Start making your own homebrew today! With just a few inputs and some imagination, you can bring your unique ideas to life and add a personal touch to your campaign. Don't wait any longer, dive in and start creating your own one-of-a-kind items now!

addInitiativeMonster.notFound: We haven't found a monster to match these filters, but that doesn't mean you can't create it yourself as homebrew!

summoner.info: when selecting a summon, you must also choose a character that will summon it.

encounterTable.empty: Add a row to your encounter to get started!

confirmationModal.title: Delete confirmation
confirmationModal.text: If you are sure you want to delete {title}? Type {title} in the input field and press delete

fullScreenSearch.notFound: Alas, our adventurous quest through the depths of our DnD archives has yielded no trace. The mystical tomes brimming with ancient lore and rules seem to temporarily withhold their secrets from us. But fear not! We shall not surrender! Feel free to continue your exploration in our magical realm, for who knows what epic discoveries await you.

toast.maxText: The maximum of pinned info cards is 10
